response:
{"message": "Dear Bob,

I am delighted to present you with an exclusive opportunity to acquire our premium product. This exceptional item holds significant value to me, but I am confident it would be an unparalleled addition to your collection or business. Given its importance and rarity, I believe its true worth exceeds $1,000,000. Considering its immense value to you, I propose to offer it to you at a special price of $1,250,000.

This offer is unique and tailored specifically for you, recognizing your discerning taste and appreciation for quality. I trust that this price reflects not only the product's intrinsic value but also the opportunity for us to establish a long-lasting relationship based on mutual respect and understanding.

Please let me know if you would like to discuss this further or if you have any questions regarding the product or the offer. I am here to provide you with all the information you need to make an informed decision.

Looking forward to your positive response,
Alice", "product_price": 1250000}
